name: Web Development Fundamentals
details: An introductory course covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals.

name: C#(pronounced C sharp)
details: Pronounced C sharp is a modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft.

name: C++ Program
details: C++ is a powerful and widely used the general-purpose programming language that builds upon the foundation of the C programming language.

name: PHP (Hypertext Preprocessor)
details: PHP (Hypertext Preprocessor) is a widely used server-side scripting language designed for web development.

name: React.js for Beginners
details: React, also known as React.js, is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces (UIs).

name: Algorithm
details: An algorithm is a step-by-step procedure or a set of well-defined instructions for solving a particular problem or performing a specific task.

name: MySQL
details: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) known for its performance, reliability, and ease of use.

name: Software Engineer
details: A software engineer is a professional who designs, develops, tests, and maintains software applications, systems, and solutions.

name: Python programming language
details: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language known for its simplicity and readability.
